lyrics:
"24 Hours" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "24 Hours" [Chorus:] I'm up 24 hours, money and the power Stunting on the hoes and I'm shitting on the cowards Up 24 hours, I'm up 24 hours, I'm up 24 hours No shit shave or shower Until I get my money back I gotta get my money up I'm 24 hours, it's Gucci nigga, it be so hard I'm up 24 hours (Simultaneously). New album, it's Gucci Cut up something Cory [Verse:] Damn it's a good day. Damn it's a good day Call Drumma boy and told him let's go make a hood tape First thang I'm a do pull out my 7'4 Candy coated black things sitting on them 40 O's 24 towers, 8 bricks of powder, 10 bells of dro What I payed for the flour Don't talk about my lambo, talk about my Rarri Talk about my Phantom, talk about my Harley Brick Squad Biker boy, angel named Charlie Goons going psycho white boy gnarly Every 24 seconds passing me the Marley Lames tryna diss don't effect me hardly [Chorus:] I'm up 24 hours, money and the power Stunting on the hoes and I'm shitting on the cowards Up 24 hours I'm up 24 hours. I'm up 24 hours No shit shave or shower Until I get my money back I gotta get my money up 24 hours. I'm up 24 hours It's Gucci! [Verse:] I'm going to the bank again making a deposit, It's getting kinda chilly bring my minks up out the closet Getting kinda warm get my jewerly out the safe If it be a problem put the hater in his place I'm slicker than an oil spill Sharper than a razor I'm screaming anybody get it like my nigga Major Finna cop a condo and fill it up with ammo Brick Squad Bandana on I think I'm fucking Rambo It's Gucci I'm a killer so don't push me Brick Squad ain't no pussy niggas Running with them wig splittas Niggas screaming roll one Gucci let me hold some But I can't let you hold none I hit you with the whole drum [Chorus:] I'm up 24 hours, money and the power Stunting on the hoes and shitting on the cowards So 24 hours I'm up 24 hours. I'm up 24 hours No shit, shave or shower Until I get my money back I gotta get my money up I'm up 24 hours. I'm up 24 hours [Verse:] I'm fucking with a white girl you can call me Ice-T Cause I got my crystals on you can call em Spike Lee Robbin me unlikely last try I drop em Hollow tip stopped em I ain't have time to box him Stunting like an actor Running like an athlete Strait to the money like a sprinter at a track meet First signed Waka, then I signed Gucci Then I sign Brick Squad tell em come sue me [Chorus: x2] I'm up 24 hours, money and the power Stunting on the hoes and shitting on the cowards So 24 hours I'm up 24 hours. I'm up 24 hours No shit, shave or shower Until I get my money back I gotta get my money up I'm up 24 hours. I'm up 24 hours if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Thanks to Aric McPherson for correcting these lyrics. Writer(s): Davis Radric Delantic, Gholson Christopher James AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics album: "The Return Of Mr. Zone 6" (2011) 24 Hours Mouth Full Of Gold This Is What I Do Reckless Shout Out To My Set I Don't Love Her Better Baby Brinks Pretty Bitches Pancakes Hell Yeah My Year Trick Or Treat Search
title: 24 Hours Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
